name: Amir Tadrisi
bio:
AI & Automation Engineer | Focused on AI solutions for STR and Airbnb 
I’m an AI and Automation Engineer with over a decade of experience designing intelligent systems that simplify operations and drive measurable results.
I have my focus in the short-term rental (STR) and Airbnb industry, where I’ve helped hosts, property managers, and STR businesses leverage AI to optimize their operations, save time, and grow revenue.
